description:
Also available SMILES ZEN.  Also available SMILES, both games in one!

SMILES DROP is an all new take on the classic matching game genre.  It's designed for players of all skill levels, with interesting new play styles to discover and grow in to.  Play at your own pace.  SMILES DROP introduces the “Touch Swap”, an easier and faster way to play.  And unlike many similar games, you don't have to wait to make your next move. Make matches, break ice, rocks, twist and turn your way to higher scores.

FEATURES:
- 10 game modes including Long Play, Match Challenge, and Avalanche
- 3 themes including Adorable Vegetables, Cheerful Weather, and Colorful Blocks
- High Scores and Statistics
- Over 100 Achievements to unlock
- Upbeat soundtrack with encouraging sound design
- Automatically saves your progress on exit
